_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The stages of practice [sn48.18:1.6]: Practicing to realize the fruit of perfection
Practicing to realize the fruit of non-return
Practicing to realize the fruit of once-return
Practicing to realize the fruit of stream-entry
The outsider (a causal sequence) [sn48.1: Someone who totally and utterly lacks the five faculties is an outsider who belongs with the ordinary persons.
